text: The Brothers McMullen is an American 1995 comedy movie. It is about three brothers in Long Island, New York. The plot has love, sex, marriage, infidelity and deception. This movie was released in January 1995 in the United States and was directed by first time director Edward Burns. Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Burns
title: The Brothers McMullen
